scripts.prisma:migrate: docker compose exec -it api sh -c 'npx prisma migrate dev'
scripts.prisma:generate: docker compose exec -it api sh -c 'npx prisma generate'
scripts.prisma:seed: docker compose exec -it api sh -c 'node prisma/seed.mjs'
scripts.prisma:reset: docker compose exec -it api sh -c 'npx prisma migrate reset'
scripts.db:create-test: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.test -- sh -c 'docker compose exec -it node-express-starter-postgres psql -U $POSTGRES_USER -c "CREATE DATABASE $POSTGRES_DB;"'
scripts.test: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.test -- sh -c 'npx prisma migrate reset --force && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx jest --watchAll --coverage'
